title: Status Effects
content: Status Effects are more commonly referred to as Conditions in Baldur's Gate 3. These are special conditions that provides bonuses or penalties that affect a character for a certain amount of time. Positive effects are usually acquired through Skills, and Equipment, while negative effects come from enemy weapons and abilities.
